channel.title: 8080 on David Tyler's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in 8080 on David Tyler's Blog

item.title: Bringing emulation into the 21st century
item.description: What happens when you apply 21st century application design to the emulation of old arcade machines? How much can we improve the emulation community?

item.title: Experiments in 8080 static/jit compilation
item.description: Is it possible to recompile 8080 assembly into CLR IL? Can that be extended to deliver the Space Invaders arcade machine as a dynamically recompiled CLR binary?
